content:
On my first day of FHIR work, my FHIR stack gave to me
A Error in my Patient resource

It will be hard to honour the original meter (four syllables per gift, e.g. "two tur-tle-doves"), but let's have at it!

On the second day of FHIRmas this patient gave to you
Thanks for welc'ming patients, and that error(?!) in your Patient resource

p.s. (not MY error in your Patient resource!)
We've beaten you to it at one of the previous DevDays: https://vimeo.com/113076733 - The Merry FHIR Choir's rendition of the 12 days of Christmas, inclusive of a "Extension to Christmas".

"On the first-etc. day of Christmas
my true love sent to me:
Seven layers working
Six workflows going
Five gents programming
Four patient apps
Three FHIR Chiefs
Two RESTful calls
and a Re-source in a bun-dle."

Fine... I'll post my complete one...
On my twelfth day of FHIR work, my FHIR stack gave to me
Twelve IG compiles
Eleven version mis-match
Ten wrong transactions
Nine github pushes
Eight bugs in Jira
Seven bad extensions
six tokens broken
five fhir chat posts
four oh fours
three tooling bugs
Two failing Ops
and An error in my Patient resource
